attributes.action: Authorise a christmas carol collection in the styleeee of "The Fonejacker" (Kayvan Novak.).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Be bont a bissmass ceedee sang in the style of "The Fonejacker" (Kayvan Novak).
 Bissman hits would never be as memerable as that sang by Terry Tibbs and George Agdgdwngo.

Such hits could include:

Be Bish you a berry Bissmass, 
Talk to me silent night, 
Terry Tibbs is coming to town, 
We three african kings of bank account details, 
A Vishka Vishkovski Christmas Carol
and
Good King Ja Fool

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
